name: notself
text: A comment left by notself was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by straw, sharksarecoming, Saint, sumisueme)

name: zem
text: I should use the lispy comeback

name: saint
text: making fun of a man with no lisp by using a lisp is pretty damn insulting.

name: tekende
text: This is another thing I will strongly consider doing to my children if I ever have any and they piss me off.

name: anticitizen
text: Yeah I have a running list of such things in my head as well.

name: mortshire
text: lie bot has a beauty in his soul.

name: wittyname
text: ROBOTS HAVE NO SOULS.

name: mortshire
text: :C

name: i_love_kate
text: A comment left by i_love_kate was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by lamboyster, fuzzyrobot, Vladimir, dretienne)

name: deusoma
text: It's an emoticon with a really big frown, what's there to figure out?

name: i_love_kate
text: I don't remember. D:

name: i_love_kate
text: Oh shit! It's a vulture! Get in the car!

name: dusty
text: Since the truth hurts more than anything, is he not therefore the gentlest soul?

name: rapid_roy
text: Beneath his cold, metal exterior, Lie Bot dreams of one day touring with a bluegrass band.

name: spinynorman
text: When you slap a magnet on his head he sings "Jimmy Crack Corn" but alters the lyrics to be insulting comments about both corn and those within visual range.

name: c_dizzle
text:
Chubbed for the futurama reference.
It's hard to play both treble and bass clef on a banjo, I'd reckon.

name: doctorbeene
text: Chubbied for the banjo vernacular.

name: foea
text: Take that, you stupid corn.

name: straw
text: I'm pretty sure he doesn't like playing the banjo, though.

name: dusty
text: I'm sure that somehow, even without lyrics, his music lies to you.

name: jasonpaulmiller
text: very interesting melody there.

name: boxus
text: very familiar melody...

name: 1000hz
text: I bet you Todd would charge Lie Bot royalties if he found out about this.

name: thatskotkid
text: I'm sort of scared that anyone found out about this.

name: crinklebat
text: I'm sort of delighted that anyone found out about this.

name: heyman
text: wonderful spot, you've got good eyes

name: odei
text: Lie Bot's shoes disturb me every time.

name: nutmeg
text: stuff it lie bot's shoes are banger!

name: spectre
text: A comment left by spectre was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by rowboat, norm, Shinkicka)

name: aperson
text: Onstad manages to convey 'garage' with such economy of line and tone.

name: joeyramoney
text: lie bot is playing in the bass and treble clefs at the same time. i'm fairly sure that isn't possible on a banjo.

name: thatskotkid
text: He's playing a duet with his MIDI sequencer.

name: tekende
text: It's an elaborate lie.

name: honesttom
text: The banjo is one of the all time great comedy instruments.

name: xerol
text:
bbbanjo.mp3

It appears to be in some kind of 13/8 meter.

name: waldo913
text:
Holy crap nice going. Chubbied.

I guess it's not necessary to be skilled in musical composition if you're as fantastic at art, cooking, writing and humor as Onstad.

Or maybe robots play a different sort of music than the rest of us...

name: deusoma
text: I like to imagine that Onstad totally knows what it sounds like and that Lie Bot just sucks at composing, but the alt text makes that exceedingly unlikely.

name: kelsotimebomb
text:
Hella chubbied. However, you forgot the sustained whole notes over the first measure.

But dang, sir, if this isn't a Thing, I don't know what is.

name: qingofchina
text: The terrible thing is that you would have to be moderately talented to play all of that on the banjo.

name: lrosetw8
text: Robot music!

name: steinhauser
text: I guess a robot would have to be crazy to wanna be a folk singer...

name: seph
text: Robots can't eat dinner, but they can mad run Subways.

name: puguglypress
text: The robot lashed out at his friend's masculinity to hide his own unmet needs.

name: milo
text: thing is, your meant to play bass and treble notes simultaneously on a banjo, bass with thumb treble with index and middle fingers. this technique is also used for guitars and such

name: carlyle
text: The Derisive Wispth is unbecoming of a man of Lie Bot's stature.

name: nephilim8
text:
Except he's a robot.

hw.
